sentences.sContent: We took a floatplane to the trail head. Our taciturn guide pointed out that it was this robust aircraft that had helped to open up the wilderness in the Fifties.
sentences.sContent_eng: We took a floatplane to the trail head. Our taciturn guide pointed out that it was this robust aircraft that had helped to open up the wilderness in the Fifties.
sentences.sCn: 我们乘坐一架水上飞机来到小道的顶端，沉默寡言的导游指着飞机说，五十年代人们正是在这种飞机的得力帮助下开拓荒野。

synos.tran: 沉默寡言的；无言的，不太说话的

trans.tranOther: speaking very little, so that you seem unfriendly
